name: Dream Fruit
description: Create a mystical Dream Fruit. Give it to someone of your choosing. Onece they eat it, they will be brought to the Dream Realm.

entity_action.command: give @s minecraft:enchanted_golden_apple{display:{Name:'{"text":"Dream Fruit","color":"light_purple","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Eat to enter the Dream Realm","color":"aqua","italic":false}']}} 1
